p.a-desc.description: I am 23 years old, interested in computing and expanding his knowledge, mainly in the area of ​​web development. I am a creative person, with a good vocabulary and easy to adapt and learn. I don't have work experience yet, but I would love to have it, preferably as a Front-End web developer.Soon I will start studying Back-End, but for now I am still practicing what I have learned. I have a basic web development (HTML5 and CSS) certification, a Javascript certification and a React JS certification. I have Bootstrap, Git and GitHub knowledge. I love web development, so I hope we can work together.
